page.title: 09CLUBS IN FOLLY GATE
page.content: In{Folly Gate}there is a football club, a darts club and a skittles club. The{football team}is organised by Ken Vallance who is also a player. There are thirty five members in the club so they are able to have two teams. They play in the local leagues and the teams play in different leagues. There are two pitches in Follygate. The furthest place they play at is Honiton. The{darts club}play in the Crossways Inn and they have one mens team and one ladies team. They only play in the winter time. They also play matches against local pub teams. There is also a{skittles club}which play in the Village Hall as they play indoors. The{Womans Institute}meet once a month in the hall and the {Thrift Club}meet once a week where people save their money.
